Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at California.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
